flavor: He's a legend among murlocs.  "Mrghllghghllghg!", they say.
text: Charge. Has +1 Attack for each other Murloc on the battlefield.
howToGet: Unlocked when you have all the Murlocs from the Classic Set.
howToGetGold: Unlocked when you have all the Golden Murlocs from the Expert and Basic Sets.
name: Old Murk-Eye
